reviews.review: Very Good !

Oyun iidir hoşdur tavsiye ederim ama Eksikleri çok şu amk katilleri campledikce katil nerf yesin yani mesela 10 metrekare içinde 10 saniye kalınca once yavaşlık yesin 15 saniye kalınca katilin yeri tüm oyunculara gozuksun 25 saniye durursa körlük yesin boylece camp azalsın !!

Интересная игра. По началу может даже пугать в некоторых ситуациях, но все же это не хоррор, а соревновательная игра. Затягивает разнообразием перков, карт, выживших и маньяков. Каждая игра выходит уникальной и захватывающей, главное относиться к игре с весельем, а не бомбить если ман решил тебя закемпить или затунеллить, или сурв приседает на каждой скинутой палете.

Though victory is very sweet this game is VERY unbalanced in terms of killer to survivors. To a degree its honestly just not that fun as a survivor. Sure, some games are really fun but its more or less ONLY when the killer is a fresh-to-the-game NOOB. The game is FAR to on the killers side. Everything from his movement speed being at least twice the speed of yours to the ridiculous amount of hooks he can put you on SEEMINGLY always only a matter of 5 feet away because they're so plentiful. Even with a good team of survivors using all tool boxes with high charges, there STILL to many hooks and there will always BE one within 10 feet of you SOMEHOW. The outside maps are the ONLY maps the survivors really have a chance and that's only because they can somewhat see across the map. Indoor maps are completely in the killers favor and are damn near IMPOSSIBLE to escape. I mean in an idea of having fun playing video games this game just isnt that. Its frustration because I mean its just so POORLY balanced. Look at games like Friday the 13th or Deceit. Atleast in friday the 13th you can somewhat FIGHT Jason. You got all kinda stuns you can do. Ways to GET AWAY from him. On this game once the killers chasing you your FUCKED especially on a indoor map. There's no stuns, the obstacles you can use HARDLY do a damn thing. Tearing down hooks can be easily fixed so fuck your toolboxes. Its just BLATANTLY against the survivors. To an extent that any killer but complete noobs will not EVER lose.
It has a very simple play style that's easy to grasp. It makes my heart pump and makes you really pay attention to the area around you.

Extremely fun game, if buggy at times.

I don't suggest playing this as your main game, as playing it as your 'try-hard' game can make it extremely frusterating because of the instances of tunneling, survivor BMing, and the overall at times questionable community, but when played with friends, and/or only for fun, it can be a great experience!

muy malo.

Game might be tough at the start since you don't have many perks or good teamates but with a couple games you will pick it up very quickly especially if you watch some guides on youtube! although the game is very fun i wouldn't recommend it for everyone in order to have the best possible time while playing this game you will need some friends unless you are interested in playing killer but for me personally the game becomes boring after a while. the game is very free to play friendly you don't need to spend a lot of money on dlc's killers survivors etc. since once you level up the basic survivors you will have most of the strongest perks. some games might be quite competetive , toxic and very luck based but for the most part its quite balanced and lots fun. Hackers are very rare to find after 700 hours i've only came across 3. community can be toxic but thats just how most games are. in conclusion i recommend to buy this game on sale if you like to play a somewhat scary multiplayer game since sales on this game are quite often to happen. Hope this helped <3

I love this game, would give it a 7.5/10. The things I don't much like about this game is that you can't see your heartbeat (to tell how close the killer is), there is no option to add people you've recently played with, and the fact that all the prettier/best characters you have to pay for with real money. Other than these 4 things, I would recommend this game. Okay, bye!!!
This game is a good 4 v 1 but it has a lot of improving to do. Making the game a little more even between the killer and survivor.

This can be a fun experience, but it has 3 problems.
1. The idea of Perks and Add-Ons. In the game, there are permanent perks you can unlock for your character that change the way you play, e.g Crows send out a radar-like echo when you are near a survivor, allowing you to follow them better. Add-Ons are smaller perks that are used up at the end of a match. Until you unlock them by playing specific characters, many of the best perks are locked away behind characters you have to buy with real money, or killers you might not want to play.
2. The Matchmaking system is probably the worst you can come across. It takes a long time to get games, and very often the gap between players' skill levels will be by many ranks and hundreds/thousands of hours. There are tens of thousands of players playing all around the world on any one day, you should not be waiting this long.
3 A very toxic community. I'm not talking from when you're playing the game and you have a post game chat, from my experience people have been more than polite, relative to other online communities. Out of game discussion on forums and websites is awful, with people complaining about every facet of the game. 

One of the few asymmetrical multiplayer games, but even still, you could do better.

I really like this game and it's not perfect mostly due to poor matchmaking times. it's very annoying to wanna play the killer but you can't due to waitng 30 minutes to be put into a game as the killer.

잘하는 살인자들은 확실히 능력을 잘 활용해서 생존자들을 압박했고,
생존자들은 포인트와 최종생존을 위해 서로 최대한 도우면서 플레이함.

매칭이 불균형하게 잡히는 문제는 아직 겪지 못했지만,
정말 잘하는 살인자를 만났을때 그 무기력함은 다시는 겪기 싫었음.

매칭만 비슷한 실력의 사람끼리 잘 잡아준다면
오랫동안 재밌게 즐길 게임이 될듯.

참고로, 매크로가 있지만 서로 블러드포인트(경험치,스킬포인트) 때문에 다들 바삐 움직임...
매크로가 아닌 게임은 스릴과 재미, 매크로는 경험치 2배 이벤트마냥 레벨업 및 블러드포인트 받는 재미인가 싶음.

The game is fun to play especially when you're playing at night or with a friend.
Unfortunately you can't play as a killer if you're playing with a friend of yours ( it's made this way because otherwise you can give exact info to the "enemy" team ). Other than that the game is worth the price especially if you get it on sale then it's win, win for both sides ( mostly for you ).

Also, some of the killers are extremely overpowered ( one of them is the Nun ) the fact that she can teleport between walls doesn't sound broken because it's already broken. The game isn't hard to learn but it's hard to play as a survivor, both you and your teammates must know what to do in order to get the generators going and escape from the killer.

For the folks that think it's easy to win as a survivor it's not. And if you think you can win easy as a survivor give it a go.
Either way you can easily refund the game if you haven't played it for more than 2 hours.

[h1]There are three types of killers : [/h1]

🦐 Those who will camp you, even worse, facecamp you, they are the most annoying, they will totally make you tilt but it doesn't matter! It's only a game, why u have to be mad ?!

🦐 Those who will tunnel you the whole game. They don't camp, but they keep a BIG eye on you. Someone free you from the hook? Are you hurt? Someone else is hurt? We all know that you will be taken again! Try to survive my nibba !

🦐 Those who don't camp, they will hook you and leave to make their live elsewhere, find other survivors. So you have the time to heal yourself quietly, do some generators and you can surely even have bloodpoints! I love you guys.

[h1]There are three types of survivors :[/h1]

💀 Those who are ♥♥♥♥♥ as ♥♥♥♥ rank one, prestige III with full perks, still urban evading in a corner.

💀 Those who will last a long time against the killer BUT who will use all the pallets of the map. So when they fall and it's your turn to be chased, you are in a mess.

💀Those who know how to play, who come to help you, who use the body block, who will use all the necessary means to get you out of trouble. (Thats me C:).

And to all those who dunhook me in front of the killer, even though they know he will go for me, just go die by cancer.
